Summary: oddly moving light that disappeared rapidly
divs: sighting detailsmy family and i returned home from school\the grocery store, and as i was getting groceries from the car and taking them into the house, i looked up at the stars, like i always do. i am a lover of the night sky, and it draws me. as i was grabbing a bag of groceries, i noticed an odd star that started moving at a constant speed and moving directly upward. it moved almost like the speed of a plane, but it was just a star (or so i thought at the time). however it moved upward in a straight line. it was too high up and quiet to be a helicopter and it moved too much against the earths rotation to be a satellite. i watched the light move upward for about 30 or 40 seconds then headed in to drop off the groceries. when i came back out to get more bags, about ten seconds or less later, the light was gone. i looked all over and couldn't find anything moving in the sky. i thought it was odd, because at the speed it was moving, ten seconds later i would still have been able to see it. i had always been curious about ufos, but that night i was certain.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There was one other sighting in Houston on or around November 19th 2006
